abstract: Nebraska's governor objects to the route of a proposed oil-sands pipeline and has urged the Obama administration to deny a permit for its construction.
snippet: Nebraska's governor objects to the route of a proposed oil-sands pipeline and has urged the Obama administration to deny a permit for its construction.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Dave Heineman of Nebraska calls a special session of the state legislature to address growing concerns over the proposed Keystone XL pipeline, which would carry tar sands oil across one of the Midwest's most important aquifers. [The Los Angeles Times]

headline.main: On Our Radar: Nebraska Lawmakers Will Meet on Keystone
